path.style: fill: rgb(216, 216, 216); stroke-width: 36px; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-linejoin: round; stroke: rgb(0, 153, 102); fill-opacity: 0;
fill: rgb(216, 216, 216); stroke-width: 36px; stroke: rgb(0, 153, 102); stroke-linecap: round;
fill: rgb(216, 216, 216); stroke-width: 36px; stroke: rgb(0, 153, 102); stroke-linecap: round;
